g:state.name: ANY
g:state.g:description: This is not an actual state, but rather a collection of sub-terminals that are referenced by g:token rules. In the file that is generated for input to JavaCC, each becomes a "private regular expression". (It would be better to make this distinction in the g:token element.)

g:tref.name: CommentContents

g:transition.if: xpath1 xpath20 xpath30 xpath31 xslt2-patterns xslt30-patterns

g:state.name: EXPR_COMMENT
g:state.g:description: The "(:" token marks the beginning of an expression Comment, and the ":)" token marks the end. This allows no special interpretation of other characters in this state.
